start.not_found: The device is not found or parameter missmatch.
start.intro:
Enter device IP address

IP can be found in the WIZ app under device, section "settings - device info".

Please use form-button to add the settings!
start.invalidIP: Please enter a valid IPv4 address, e.g. 192.168.1.10
start.required: IP address is a required value.
